title: HYDERABAD POLO AND RIDING CLUB - Equestrian
text: HYDERABAD POLO AND RIDING CLUB - Equestrian +91 – 9177 00 00 56 info@hprc.co.in Member Login Pay Now toggle navigation Home About us Who We Are Mission Vision Values Managing Committee Start Riding About Riding Packages Beginners Riding Programme Intermediate Riding Programme Advanced Riding Programme Polo Equestrian Polo About Polo Stick & Ball Chukkers Events Past Events Upcoming Events SPORTS CENTRE Tennis Badminton Squash Swimming pool Basketball Futsal Gym Sauna Upcoming SportS Event Packages Gold Package Platinum Package RESTAURANTS Chukkers Snaffles Bistro BANQUETS Membership Events & Media Photo Gallery Video Gallery News Events Newsletters Blogs Contact Us Equestrian Advanced Riding Programme Equestrian Equestrian HPRC is proud to be a big part of Hyderabad's equestrian heritage that dates back to the Nizams. HPRC has contributed fervently to the elite and regal horse riders and polo enthusiasts community in Hyderabad. Our association with The Telangana State Equestrian Association (TSEA) aims to identify talent and make them eligible to compete in the equestrian events like Show Jumping, Dressage, Tent Pegging in the National/International level competitions conducted by the Equestrian Federation of India (EFI), New Delhi. In February, 2016, HPRC successfully conducted the NATIONAL EQUESTRIAN COMPETITION 2016 in association with TSEA. Come practise Equestrian Arts at HPRC where students can explore this state-of-the-art equestrian centre amid a climate perfectly suited for year-round riding and stable-side education. With a comprehensive academic program complemented by a national championship equestrian team and a faculty of accomplished riders and coaches, students are prepared for careers across the equestrian spectrum. Timings: 6.00am to 10.00am & 4.00pm to 9.00pm Explore Home About Us Membership Login Start Riding Polo News & Events Contact Us Quick links Apply for Membership Pay Now e-Brochure Past Events Facilities Sport Center Restaurants Banquets Address Near Mrugavani Resort and Spa, Aziz Nagar Village, Gandipet, Ranga Reddy District, Hyderabad, Telangana, India - 500075 reaz@hprc.co.in +91 9177000056 View Location On Map Gallery © 2005 – 2024.
